mapper.select: SELECT bo_title, bo_content, mem_email, bo_date, mem_name, member.mem_num mem_num FROM board FULL OUTER JOIN member ON board.mem_num = member.mem_num WHERE board.bo_num=#{bo_num}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (re_num,bo_num, mem_num, re_content, re_date) values(seq_reply.nextval,#{bo_num},#{mem_num},#{re_content},sysdate)
mapper.select: select member.mem_name as mem_name,member.mem_num,reply.re_num,reply.re_content,reply.re_date from member inner join (select * from reply where bo_num=#{value}) reply on member.mem_num = reply.mem_num order by reply.re_num desc
